Lexicon

Jot down new ideas and modify them as you wish.

  • Deliverable: Web application feature
  • Role: Back-end developer
  • Methods:
    • Build: Node.js and Express.js
    • Architecture: REST APIs for sending HTTP requests to MongoDB database
    • Login and Register: Passportjs Local Stategy to store user's credential
    • Encrypt: Use bcryptjs to encrypt and validate user's password
    • Deploy: AWS cloud through Heroku Service

About Me

I love to learn new things and I always enjoy the process of seeing a project come together. I possess a strong and flexible foundation in website development which facilitates building, modifying and customizing adaptable websites as new needs evolve. I am a web development online tutorial addict.
